DOC.brief_title: African American Depression Intervention Trial ( AADI )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion . Selfidentified AfricanAmerican men woman , age 30 60 , symptom depression evidence data Composite International Diagnostic Interview 2.1 ( CIDI ) . Although age inclusion broad , pilot study show positive outcome mixed age group Exclusion criterion .
